name: Déjà Vu II: MacVenture Series
description: Relive the original MacVenture Series version of Déjà Vu II! Play through the Mac and Apple IIGS versions as a hard-boiled detective in a city full of crime and mystery.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up Memory: 2 MB RAM

reviews.review_text: This game is classic. Found myself laughing and laughing each time I did something stupid and random. I still remember playing the originals and brings back memories even in real life where I made similar choices. Be prepaid for MisAdventures!!
